amendment.description: To express the sense of the Senate regarding the amount of United States debt that is foreign-owned.

vote.text: Amendment SA 157 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 157 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Bayh. (consideration: CR S2941-2942, S2942) To express the sense of the Senate regarding the amount of United States debt that is foreign-owned.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 157 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 157 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Bayh.
